iterations.description: Hardcoded pixel constants in DockPaneStripNG.cs (tab max width 200px, icon sizes 16px, gaps) are not DPI-scaled, causing tabs to be too narrow and icons too small on 4K/highDPI screens.

comments.author: farosch
comments.snippet: Is this still the case with WIndows 10 2004 and the latest Prerelease build?

notes:
AI triage (claude): Hardcoded pixel constants in DockPaneStripNG.cs (tab max width 200px, icon sizes 16px, gaps) are not DPI-scaled, causing tabs to be too narrow and icons too small on 4K/highDPI screens.
Approach: Scale the hardcoded tab dimension constants (_DocumentTabMaxWidth, _DocumentIconWidth, _DocumentIconHeight, various gap values) by the current DPI scale factor using DeviceDpi/96f or AutoScaleFactor, so tabs render proportionally on highDPI displays.
